thread.title: Bitcoin’s Crashing? That Won’t Stop Arbitrage Traders From Raking in Millions

author: Alexander Osipovich
title: Bitcoin’s Crashing? That Won’t Stop Arbitrage Traders From Raking in Millions
text:
One of the oldest tactics on Wall Street is going viral in the world of digital currencies.
The strategy, called arbitrage, is simple. If something trades at different prices in multiple places, buy it where it’s cheap and sell where it’s dear. Traders call that “capturing the arb.”
... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
